item.title: Leveraging format string vulnerabilities to interrogate Win32 process memory
item.description: Although format string vulnerabilities aren’t seen as much in the wild these days since they are so easy to spot in source code, I’d like to use this class of vulnerability to demonstrate what information can be inferred from a memory leak. Format string vulnerabilities open a window into the
